conbody.p: Use the provision at 252.236-7011 , Overseas Architect-Engineer Services—Restriction to United States Firms, in solicitations for architect-engineer contracts that are—
(3) To be performed in Japan, in any North Atlantic Treaty Organization member country, or in countries bordering the Arabian Gulf.
